AspectLibrary.Name: Atesh.Metalama
AspectLibrary.Author: Onur Er
AspectLibrary.Summary: This library contains straightforward implementations of contracts like [GreaterThan], [LessThan], [Range] or [NotNull] or method-based preconditions through [ValidateOperations].
AspectLibrary.Description: This library predates Metalama.Patterns.Contracts which is more complete but also more complex implementation of programming by contracts. We mention Atesh.Metalama as a sample because it shows simple implementations.

Aspect.Name: NotNull
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a non-null value.

Aspect.Name: GreaterThan
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a value greater than a given minimum.

Aspect.Name: GreaterThanOrEqual
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a value greater than or equal to a given minimum.

Aspect.Name: LessThan
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a value smaller than a given minimum.

Aspect.Name: LessThanOrEqual
Aspect.Description: Verifies that the target field, property or parameter is assigned a value smaller than or equal to a given minimum.

Aspect.Name: ValidateOperation
Aspect.Description: Executes one or more methods before the target method.
